item.title: Expressions
item.description: Vuejs Expressions <div id="app"> <p>I have a {{ product }}</p> <p>{{ product + 's' }}</p> <p>{{ isWorking ? 'YES' : 'NO' }}</p> <p>{{ product.getSalePrice() }}</p> </div>

item.title: Binding
item.description: Vuejs Binding Fullhand attribute binding <a v-bind:href="url">...</a> Shorthand <a :href="url">...</a> Two way data binding <input v-model="firstName"> Vuejs Binding2 True or false will add or remove attribute: <button :disabled="isButtonDisabled”>... If isActive is truthy, the class ‘active’ will appear: <div :class="{ active: isActive }">... item.title: List Rendering
item.description: Vuejs List Rendering Basic array loop <li v-for="item in items" :key="item.id"> {{ item }} </li> Loop with access to index <li v-for="(item, index) in items">...</li> Baisc object loop <li v-for="value in object">...</li> <li v-for="(value, index) in object">...</li> <li v-for="(value, name, index) in object">...</li> Loop using component instead of html native element e.g. div, li <cart-product v-for="item in products" :product="item" :key="item.id">

item.title: Actions/Events
item.description: Vuejs Actions/Events <button v-on:click="addToCart">...</button> // Fullhand <button @click="addToCart">...</button> // Shorthand Arguments can be passed: <button @click="addToCart(product)">...</button> To prevent default behaviour (e.g. page reload): <form @submit.prevent="addProduct">...</form> Only trigger once: <img @mouseover.once="showImage"> .stop // Stop all event propagation .self // Only trigger if event.target is element itself Keyboard entry example: <input @keyup.enter="submit"> Call onCopy when control-c is pressed: <input @keyup.ctrl.c="onCopy"> Key modifiers: .tab .delete .esc .space .up .down .left .right .ctrl .alt .
